headline: Republican Warns of D.W.I. Then He Is Charged With It.
abstract: The top Republican in the New York State Assembly said he would resign his leadership position after he admitted to driving while drunk.
lead_paragraph: Last month, the top Republican in the New York State Assembly, Brian M. Kolb, published a guest column in a local newspaper warning against the dangers of drunken driving, especially during the holidays, noting that “tragedy can be only one bad decision away.”
